title: Valtice Chateau
description: Valtice's 12th-century castle, the seat of the wealthy Liechtenstein family, is one of the country's finest baroque structures, the work of JB Fischer von Erlach and Italian architect Domenico Martinelli. Entry is by guided tour only, with several different tours on offer. The grounds and gardens are free to explore during opening times.
hours: 9am-5pm Tue-Sun Apr-Sep, to 3pm Oct, 10am-2pm Sat & Sun Nov, closed Dec-Mar
